name: Silent hospital
description:
Third person isometric shooter. You will have to scape from this infested hospital defeating lot of zombie waves.

Assets used:

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/modular-horror-hospital-ma...

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/painted-ui-61967

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/sci-fi-weapons-pack-16603

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/hospital-horror-pack-44045

Music from Silent Hill 2
